summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of eSports Tournament Plugin Phase 1 completed. All features working correctly: JWT authentication, team management, comments, notifications, admin panel, and match scheduling. Backend: 100% tests passed (29/29). Frontend: 100% features working.
seed_data_creation: Multiple TEST_ prefixed teams and users created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 features fully tested and working. Backend tests cover: Auth (register, login, me), Teams (CRUD, member management), Comments (tournament comments), Notifications (list, unread count, mark read), Admin (dashboard, users, settings). Frontend tests cover: Login flow, Registration flow, Auth state persistence, Logout, Teams page, Admin panel with all tabs, Tournament comments, Protected routes.

backend: test_login_admin_success - Admin login with valid credentials
test_login_invalid_credentials - Login rejection with wrong credentials
test_auth_me_with_token - Token validation and user retrieval
test_create_team - Team creation with name and tag
frontend: Login page elements present (email, password, submit)
Login with admin credentials - redirects to home, shows username
Auth state persistence - Teams link, Admin link, notification bell, logout button visible
Logout flow - Login button reappears, user display hidden
Teams page - Create team button, form inputs, team creation, team list
Admin panel - Dashboard stats, Tournaments tab, Games tab, Users tab, Settings tab
Admin settings - Payment fields (Stripe/PayPal), SMTP fields
Registration page - All form elements, successful registration
Tournament comments - Kommentare tab, comment input, comment submission
Protected routes - Teams page shows login message without auth
Protected routes - Admin page shows access required without auth
